Import Wallet Enter private key You can copy and paste the private key here, or scan a QR Code generated with private key. Private key copied, Remember to clear the clipboard after use. Ready to import Done
Are you being watched?\nPlease make sure backup under secured condition Look out\nPlease import under secured condition Backup Under secured condition\nAirplane mode preferred Got it. Show me the mnemonic Got it. Show me the private key Got it. Ready to import. Backup later
Screenshots are not secure Screenshots may be leak via photo album. You can backup under airplane mode. Got it Safety First Airplane mode preferred. Avoid transfer through internet to leak private key. Save offline You can make a old mobile phone offline as a cold storage to scan QR Code then save the private key. Secure Storage Otherwise, use a password manage software to save the private key with encryption. Remember to clear the clipboard once saved.
Look out Please make sure to scan QR code under secured condition It recommanded to use a device with camera to scan the QR Code to read private key offline Show QR Code

Choose a way to activate By RMB By friend By exchange By invite code You need to pay for resources like CPU, NET and RAM in order to activate your account Fee Wechat Pay
Please make sure to back up your private key, when your friend finishes the transfer, you will need to import the private key into Gemma once again to use your account. Account can not be restored if the private key was lost. Please make sure to back up your private key, when your finish the transfer at any exchange that support memo, you will need to import the private key into Gemma once again to use your account. Account can not be restored if the private key was lost.
Please transfer in any exchange that support memo into smart code signupeoseos and<font color = "#ff5500">use words followed as memo </font>，to finish creating.
Please let your friend transfer into smart code signupeoseos and<font color = "#ff5500">use words followed as memo </font>，to finish creating.
In order to create your account, please transfer at least<font color="#ff5500"> 2 EOS </font> ：your account will delegate <font color = "#426bd4"> 0.1 EOS</font> for CPU，<font color = "#ff5500"> 0.1 EOS</font> for NET， the remaining<font color="#ff5500"> 1.8 EOS </font>will be used for purchasing RAM at current price。

Backup mnemonic Understood, show mnemonic The one who knows your mnemonic will have no limits to get access to your asset.Please write it down and save it in secure copied Please write your mnemonic down and save it in secure
Mnemonic is used to restore wallet private key, when comes to restore wallet, like import a PC version EOS wallet, reinstall APP, lost of phone and forget your password, etc, please use your mnemonic to restore your private key. Please click the mnemonic in the right order to verify it. Copy and paste mnemonic to input area, or use a QR code Input Mnemonic，use space to spilt Verify Mnemonic Import Mnemonic

Multi-currency hardware wallet Fingerprint setup timed out Skip Retry Put your finger on the recognition zone and lift it, \n and repeat for several times. Adjust holding gestures\nto collect marginal fingerprint
Backup wallet Got it, display mnemonic If someone gets your mnemonic, s/he will access your assets directly! Please transcribe the mnemonic and store it in a safe place! transcribed Please write down your wallet private key mnemonic and save it in a safe place. The mnemonic is used to restore the wallet private key. When you need to restore the wallet, such as importing the PC version of the EOS wallet, reinstalling the app, losing the phone, forgetting the password, etc., please use the mnemonic To restore the wallet private key Please click on the mnemonic you have copied by sequence to verify that the transcript is correct. Copy and paste the mnemonic to the input box, or scan the QR code generated by the mnemonic Enter the mnemonic, delimited by a space Verify mnemonic Import mnemonic Backup mnemonic Be sure to back up the mnemonic. The mnemonic can restore the private key, and the private key represents the control and ownership of the digital asset. When an accident occurs, this is the only way to get back the assets. Please beware of your surroundings\n Make sure to back up in a safe environment Please check your surroundings\n Make sure to start importing in a safe environment Backup wallet Please backup your phone in a safe environment\nYou could switch to flight mode during backup I see, display mnemonic I see, display the private key I see, start importing Backup later Do not take screenshots The system screenshot may be viewed by other apps in the album, and the flight mode can be turned on before backup! I understand It is recommended to enable the flight mode, do not use network transmission, in case the hacker captures the private key. Encrypted storage If you do not have a backup phone, you can also copy the private key and use the encryption software or password management tool to store it. Please clear the system clipboard in time after storage. Watch out Please scan the QR code in an environment where no one or camera is around to prevent the QR code from leaking. It is recommended to use an offline device with a camera to scan the QR code to obtain the private key and store it in a reasonable manner. Connecting WOOKONG Bio WOOKONG Bio does not support resource staking or RAM trading. To do this, please use another account.
